titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
1824, Jan. 1. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Museum; Hatsel : Percy calls: miss Smith dines.
qui pro quo.
2. F. Commonwealth, revise. St Ronan’s Well, p. 150.
3. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Joyce at tea: theatre, 1/2 Artaxerxes.
Jan. 4. Su. Commonwealth, revise. N G calls: M W S dines. St Ronan’s, p. 310; Vol. II, p. 154.

5. M. Commonwealth, revise.
Theatre, Kenilworth; adv. Barhams
.
6. Tu. Commonwealth, revise.

7. W. Write to White, Isleworth
. St Ronan’s, p. 325.

8. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Pompeii, w. M W S
. M W S dines; adv. H P
: Joyce calls: call on Jo G
.

9. F. Call on Macgowan
&
Pouncy
: Jas White at tea. St Ronan’s, Vol. III, p. 116. Fire.
10. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. St Ronan’s, p. 323, fin.

Jan. 11. Su. Commonwealth, revise. N G calls: call on
Hayward
.

12. M. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Sturmy
&
Bampton
: M W S dines; adv. Prentis & Thrup
.

13. Tu. Commonwealth, revise.
Theatre, Philandering; adv. Barhams, J Taylor, & mrs Bartley
. Write to Mackintosh .
14. W. Commonwealth, revise.

15. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Macgowan
: theatre, 1/2 John Bull.

16. F. Commonwealth, revise. M calls: call on
Prentis , w. M W S : M W S & Prentis dine; adv. H P & H M
.

17. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Call on L Dibbin
n .
Jan. 18. Su. Commonwealth, 1 page (D of Hamilton), & revise.

19. M. Commonwealth, revise. Write to Colburn . Call on Hume
: theatre, K John, act 4.
20. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. H Prentis calls.
21. W. Commonwealth, revise. Write to C Wynn . M W S dines.

22. Th. Commonwealth, 1 page (Essex) & revise. Write to Ayrton . Call on Pouncy
n &
Macgowan
: theatre, John Bull, act 3.
243. F. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Pouncy (4 times n): Macgowan , Farmer , & E Taylor call: M W S sups.

24. Sa. Commonwealth, 1 page (Self-denying), & revise. Call on R Taylor
&
Curtis
: theatre, 1/2 Cato.

Jan. 25. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Ayrton
n . Warm weather, 3 days.

26. M. Commonwealth, revise. Call on H Robinson
&
H P
: M W S dines:
theatre, w. M J & M W S
; White, Isleworth , at tea. Richard III.

27. Tu. Commonwealth, revise.
Theatre, 1/5 Much Ado; adv. Wallace
.

28. W. Commonwealth, revise. M W S dines; adv. E Prentis, H P & Bacon
.
29. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Booth au soir.

30. F. Commonwealth, revise. Write to Ed. Taylor . Call on Rodd
: Hume dines: call on mrs Ayrton
.

31. Sa. Call on Phillips, D C
: Percy calls: theatre, w. M W S, Shylock.
Feb. 1. Su. Commonwealth, 1 page (Ireton), & revise. Hayward’s .

2. M. Call on Mackintosh
&
Northcote
: theatre, 1/5 Macbeth.
3. Tu. Commonwealth, 1/2 page, & revise. Spyring calls: sup at H P’s , w. Prentis, C Landseer, Hingeston, Henderson, M W S, M J & W . Parliament meets.

4. W. Commonwealth, revise: End of Vol. I.
M W S dines; adv. H P & Prentis
.

5. Th. Preface, 2 pp; fin. Call on R Taylor
: theatre, 1/3 Cabinet: mrs Ayrton calls.
6. F. Commonwealth, read. Stewart sups.

7. Sa. Commonwealth, read.
Opera, w. M W S, Zelmira .

Feb. 8. Su. Commonwealth, Preface, 11 lines, & read. Call on M W S
, &
Booth
; adv. R Baxter . Write to Ayrton .
9. M. Commonwealth, read. Theatre, Poachers. Revise Vol. II. M calls.

10. Tu. Commonwealth, Preface, 14 lines (chasm), & revise. H Prentis call: // call on R Taylor
: theatre, Native Land: adv. Barham & Bartley .

11. W. Commonwealth, proofs, fin. Call on Pouncy
, &
M W S
; adv. Isa. Booth .

12. Th. Write to Macgowan . M W S dines; adv. H P & C Landseer
. Homersham calls.

13. F. Albigenses, Vol. I. Call on Augustus Newton
. Complete copy of Commonwealth, Vol. I, from R T .
12 copies sent to Colburn .

14. Sa. Call on Macgowan
&
Rodd
: Bowring calls n .

Feb. 15. Su. Commonwealth, cancel, p. 17, & revise. M W S dines: sup at
Lamb’s , w. M W S & W; adv. Procter
. N G calls.

16. M. Albigenses, Vol. II, p. 280. Call on Macmillan
. Write to Stewart . Theatre, 1/2 Romeo; adv. Este
.

17. Tu. Albigenses, p. 366. Seek Davison : call on Manning
: Merewether & Bowring n call: theatre, 1/3 Lodoiska; adv. Thelwal
.

18. W. Commonwealth, revise. Albigenses, Vol. III, p. 170. M W S dines; adv. E Prentis & H P
.

19. Th. Inesilla, pp. 202. Call on Macgowan
,
Pouncy
&
Sturmy
.

20. F. Byron’s Deformed: Albigenses, p. 282. Call on Colburn
.
21. Sa. Commonwealth, revise. Albigenses, p. 335. Theatre, Merry Wives, acts 1 & 2.
Feb. 22. Su. Commonwealth, çala.

23. M. Commonwealth, çala. Seek Davison : M W S dines:
theatre, w. M J & M W S, Hamlet; adv. A Newton
: A Newton sups. Call on
Rodd
.
24. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Write to Colburn . M Jones calls.

25. W. Commonwealth, çala (Col. Bamfield). Call on Davison
: M W S at tea.

26. Th. Write to Colburn . Seek Pouncy : call on H C R
. Commonwealth, Vol. I, published .

27. F. Write to M W S, on Tragedy . Call on Pouncy
: M dines.
28. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. M W S calls: Booth at tea.
Feb. 29. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Sup at Lamb’s, w. Manning, H C R, F Ht, M W S & W . Write to Ayrton .

Mar. 1. M. Statement of Business. Write to Colburn, w. M
. Albigenses, p. 244. M W S sups. (w. M’s testimony inclosed.)

2. Tu. Statement of Business. Albigenses, p. 276, fin. Call on Davison
: theatre, Merry Wives, acts 3, 4.

3. W. Letter from Colburn . Ibbotson calls: call on
Pouncy
&
Sturmy
: seek R Taylor : M W S, E Prentis, J Bacon & H P sup.

4. Th. Statement of Business. R Taylor & M call: M W S at tea: sup at
H P’s , w. E P, C Landseer & W .
5. F. Statement of Business. M W S dines; adv. H P . She Would If She Could.

6. Sa. Statement of Business. Call on R Taylor
: seek Davison : M from Colburn , sups: call on Rodd
.

Mar. 7. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
&
Hayward
.

8. M. Commonwealth, çala. revise. British Gallery, Modern: M W S dines:
theatre, w. M W S & M J, Merry Wives; adv. A Newton
.

9. Tu. Commonwealth, revise. Tea at M W S’s , w. Williams & Cleveland; adv. A N
.
10. W. Commonwealth, çala. M W S dines: seek Davison

11. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Seek Davison : theatre, Pride have a Fall; adv. Graham
: meet Black . Write to E of Ashburnham
.

12. F. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
: Thelwal; adv. J Taylor
.
13. Sa. Commonwealth, 2 pp. M & R T call.

Mar. 14. Su. Hamlet, çala. Seek Davison : call on Hayward
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Howard Payne, M W S & W .

15. M. Richard III, çala. Seek Davison; adv. M
.

16. Tu. Richard, III, çala. Jas Ballantyne calls: call on Davison
&
Bain
.
17. W. Richard III, Lingard. Sup at M W S’s , w. Lambs & W .

18. Th. Bacon, Henry VII, çala. Call on
Davison
: M W S at tea. Bien .
19. F. Write to Mackintosh . M W S dines.

20. Su.
More, Richard III. Fog.

Mar. 21. Su. Rain. More, Ric. III: Spy, p. 200. Call on Davison
n .
22. M. Rain. Richard III, p. 6. Spy, p. 318.

23. Tu. Rain. Richard, p. 7/2. Call on Davison
n &
Pytches
: M W S dines.

24. W. Rhume. Richard, p. 9. Meet J Taylor & soeur
. Spy, Vol. II, p. 234. Cold weather, 25 days.
25. Th. Richard, p. 13/2. Spy; p. 314; Vol. III, p. 80.
26. F. Don Juan, C. 15, 16. Spy, p. 310, fin.

27. Sa. Richard, p. 17. Call on Hayward
: mrs Jo G calls. Sykes dies.

Mar. 28. Su. Richard, çala. M W S dines; adv. Bacon
.

29. M. Call on Davison twice, &
O Rees
: theatre, 4/5 Pizarro.

30. Tu. Richard, p. 19/2. Sidney calls: call on Bain
:

31. W. Call on Hume
: M W S dines; adv. Bacon
: call on J Taylor
.

Apr. 1. Th. Roxana, p. 353. Call on Northcote
.
2. F. Pioneers, Vol. I: Roxana, p. 432, fin. Col. Harwood dies .

3. Sa. Richard, p. 20. Pioneers, Vol. II, p. 133. Call on Davison
: theatre, Pride, act 3; adv. Ballantine
.

Apr. 4. Su. Write to Mackintosh . Pioneers, p. 274. Sup at
Lamb’s , w. John Payne, Manning, M W S & W; adv. Procter
.

5. M. Write to Lamb . Bourne, partner , & M call. Theatre, Lear, acts 2 & 3; adv. Thelwal
.

6. Tu. Hamlet, act 1 & 2. Seek Davison : call on Manning
&
R Taylor
: M calls, from Colburn
.

7. W. Pioneers, Vol. III, p. 120. Call on
Davison
&
M W S
: Jas White , & Boys, partner, call.
8. Th. Letter from Colburn . Pioneers, p. 364, fin: Hamlet, act 3. Theatre, 4/5 Man of the World.

9. F.
Essai . Hamlet, fin: Lear, act 1, 2. M W S dines; adv. E Prentis
. Taylor (Norwich) calls.
10. Sa. Lear, fin. Boys , & M from Colburn , call.
Apr. 11. Su. Commonwealth, 5 lines. Snow.

12. M. Nervous. Cibber, çala. Alexr Walker calls. call on Davison
.

13. Tu. Cibber, çala. R Owen calls: meet A Taylor :
Luff, partner , calls.

14. W. Mrs Sheridan, çala. A Walker & Boys call:
M W S dines; adv. Bacon & H P
.
15. Th. Mrs Sheridan, çala. Tea at M W S’s , w. Procter, Beddoes, Hogg & mesds Kent & Williams .
16. F. Victor, çala. A Walker calls: T Ht dines, arrived. Rain, two days.

17. Sa. Victor, &c.
Adelphi, Henry’s Deceptions, w. W : Coburg, Rehearsal, w. do
.

Apr. 18. Su. Indisposed. Vingt et Un Ans. Call on Jo G ; adv. N G, J J G & fils
.

19. M. Cocu Imaginaire. Society of Artists; adv. H C R
: M W S at tea: Boys calls.
Byron dies.

20. Tu. Write to Stewart . Call on Wood, books eller
,
Northcote
n &
Davison
n : theatre, Eidophusikon.

21. W.
Bien . Theo. Cibber, çala. Call on Sturmy
, &
O Rees
na : Beddoes calls.

22. Th. Theo. Cibber, çala. Call on O Rees
: M W S & T Rodd sup.

23. F. Holt White, çala. Call on R Taylor
,
Davison
&
Hayward
: Davison n & Hooley call.

24. Sa. Letters from V Ht & P P . Write to Mulready . Boys calls: M W S at tea; adv. Booth & H P
: W departs. M Jones calls, & Brewer from Derby
.

Apr. 25. Su. Holt White, & Raleigh, çala. Call on Beddoes
.

26. M. Raleigh, çala. Call on Hurst
&
Robinson
n : M calls: Hudsons dine.

27. Tu. Letter from Mackintosh . Write to E Taylor , & Holt White . Call on Hurst & R
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Manning, mrs Gliddon, M W S & W .
Miss Collins, 20 nights .

28. W. Blount, çala. Boys calls.
R Payne Knight dies.

29. Th.
Colique . M calls: M W S dines; adv. H P
. White, Isleworth , calls.
Richard Hayward dies.
30. F. Call on Davison : theatre, 1/2 Jealous Wife.

May 1. Sa. Essai. Colique . Call on Saunders
:
theatre, w. M J & M W S, 1/2 Measure for Measure; adv. Bacon , Barham & Thelwal
.

May 2. Su.
Essai . Solemn. Montaigne, Essai 1, 2, 3.

3. M. Cold & Rain. Montaigne, çala. M dines: theatre, Henry IV, acts 1 & 2; adv. Barham & Este
.

4. Tu. Write to C Kemble . Exhibition; adv. E Prentis & C Landseer
: call on Black , & at Hayward’s
:
mrs Pilcher, 10 nights .

5. W. Devils an Ass, acts 1, 2, 3. C Kemble & Gibbons call: call on Jo G ; adv. Wagener
: M W S dines; adv. H & P P, & T Ht
.

6. Th. Call on Pouncy
&
Rodd
.

7. F. T C, Four Letters. Call on Curtis
: seek Northcote (matin), & Lamb au soir. Write to Macgowan .
8. Sa. De Foe, Plague, çala. Write to Mackintosh .
May 9. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Maseres. W dines: tea M W S’s , w. mrs Pilcher, miss Collins, M J & H P .

10. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
, & at
Hayward’s
: Booth at tea:
Jo G’s , w. Wegener . Merryweather calls n .
Maseres dies, aged 93.

11. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Sidney
,
Joshua-Evans
,
R Taylor
,
Macmillan
&
Hume
: theatre, 1/3 Native Land; adv. Skeffington (& Ld Cha Churchil ) .

12. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Macgowan
, & at
Hayward’s
: M W S dines; adv. W, H P & T Ht
.

13. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Seek Davison, 6 times:
theatre, 7/10 Henry IV, w. S & H P, miss Collins & M J; adv. Wallace
.

14. F. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
&
Pouncy
: mrs Pilcher departs. J Evans calls, fr. Murray
. Write to Ayrton .

15. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Call on R Taylor
: sup at Bacon’s , w. Richards, 2 Evanses, H P & W .

May 16. Su. Commonwealth, 18 lines; & çala. N G dines; adv. M W S
: sup at W’s , w. E & C Landseer, & H P .

17. M. Commonwealth, çala. Hanson , & G Dyer & femme call: call on Jo G; adv. Wegener
. Miss Collins departs.

18. Tu. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Call on Davison
n : Ayrton calls: M Lamb dines: call on Tegart
.

19. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
&
H Robinson
: British Gallery; adv. Wilkie, Allan, Newton & E Landseer
: M W S & W dine; adv. E & S Prentis, & P & H P
.

20. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Pouncy
&
E Prentis
, adv. M W S : sup at E Prentis’s , w. St n, H P, C Landseer & W .
21. F. Commonwealth, çala. Northumberland House, w. W .

22. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Meet Sir R Phillips : call on Davison
, &
Tyrrel , for Bradshaw
.

May 23. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Call, w. M J, on G Dyer
n : M W S at tea.

24. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Hume
,
M
n , &
H C Robinson
: meet Boys .

25. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Bain
.

26. W. Commonwealth, çala (C Walker). Seek Bradshaw, Wyndham Street, 35 : sup at M W S , w. M J & Lambs .
Capel Lofft dies.

27. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Mathewses call: call on
Sturmy
, & at
Hayward’s
: theatre, Charles II; adv. Este
.

28. F. Call on Mathews (Bradshaw), &
Rodd
: M W S & W dine: call on Jo G
, &
Wegener
.

29. Sa. Commonwealth, Lambert. Call on Powncy
.
May 30. Su. Commonwealth; Lambert. A Walker & M call. Mal de tête .

31. M. Commonwealth; Oxford. Booth at tea: theatre, 2/5 Pizarro; adv. Barham, & K of Sandwich
.

June 1. Tu. Commonwealth. Call on Macgowan
&
H Robinson
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Novellos, Holmes, Clark, Hood, mrs Reynolds, M W S & W; adv. H C R
.

2. W. Letter to Macmillan . Call on
Jo G (palsy, May 31), w. Wegener
: M W S, H P, & T Ht sup; adv. W
.

3. Th.
E Taylor calls: call on Pouncy
: Mathewses call.

4. F. Commonwealth; Overton. Call on G Pouncy
&
Macgowan
.
5. Sa. Commonwealth; Overton. M W S at tea.
June 6. Su. Commonwealth; St John, & passim. P P at tea.

7. M. Write to Macmillan . Call on Isa. Booth
: Booth at tea. Jas White calls.
8. Tu. Commonwealth, frustra . Seek Davison : Booth dines.

9. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Davison
: Booth calls: M W S & W dine. Call on Wallace ; adv. Macready
: call on Joshua Evans
.

10. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Write to P H G . Call on G Pouncy
&
Macgowan
: Douglas , & Williams (on Greece ) call.

11. F. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Pouncy
: M calls; & Hanson , & mrs Waller : Booth au soir.

12. Sa. Write to Macmillan . Macmillan , Ayrton & Finch call: call on Jo G ; adv. Wegener
: Booth dines: theatre, Mathews at Home.

June 13. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Seek Davison : Kenney at tea: sup at
Lamb’s , w. Kenney, J Hazlit & wife, Lovekins, & W .

14. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Kenney
&
Davison
: Museum : M W S calls.

15. Tu.
Finch, fr. Newman
, calls: Davison & Booth invited to dinner: H M & W sup.

16. W.
London Institution, Upcot : call on Joshua Evans
&
Pouncy
: Booth, M W S & W dine; adv. Lambs, Kenney & T Ht
.

17. Th.
Museum; Lawmind . Redgauntlet, p. 70. Booth calls, fr. Hurst & Robinson
:
theatre, 1/2 Ric. III, & B Buckhorse; adv. J Taylor & Bartley
.

18. F. Indisposed. Red Gauntlet, p. 224. Call on Joshua Evans
: Burnet, Kenney, T Ht, H P, M W S & W sup, Booth at tea.
Mrs Fawcet dies.

19. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Redgauntlet, p. 319; Vol. p. II, p. 98.
Booth dines.
June 20. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Redgauntlet, p. 328. Kenney sups.

21. M. Commonwealth, çala. Write to T T . Redgauntlet, Vol. III, p. 157. Walk w. M W S (talk of ci-devant ): call on Britton
: Burnet & Douglas at tea.
Museum .

22. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Museum . Call on Isa. Booth
: Booth sups. Redgauntlet

23. W. Call on Aspland
: Parke (Birmingham) calls:
M W S & W dine.
24. Th. Stiles, Three Judges, çala.

25. F. Regicides, çala.
Booth calls, fr. Whitaker ; dines : call on Jo G
. Parliament prorogued.

26. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Write to P H G . Call on Pouncy
.

June 27. Su. Commonwealth, çala. M W S dines; adv. N G
. Evans calls.

28. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Stewart
: Jas White dines:
Booth at tea.

29. Tu. Commonwealth; Lawyers. Miss Lennard calls, fr. Jo G
.

30. W.
Bien . Commonwealth, çala.
Mrs W Hazlit calls: call on Pouncy
: sup at M W S’s , w. Kenney, H P & W . Aldis calls. Kentish Town .

July 1. Th.
Peacock , & Smith (Liverpool) call:
C Stewart & Shepherd at tea. Indisposed.

2. F. Commonwealth, çala. Booth calls: M W S & W dine; adv. H P
.

3. Sa.
Booth calls: dine at White’s, Isleworth , w. Collier & Spence : sleep.

July 4. Su. Boat to Richmond Hill, w. M J, M W S, W, White, Collier, & Buxton jr
; adv. at dinner, G White & femme , & Buxton clerk & femme , & Clayton .

5. M.
Booth & Stewart call: M W S & Kenney sup. sleeps. Dysentery.
6. Tu. Our Village, çala. Booth calls.

7. W. Write to Whitaker . M W S & W dine; adv. Kenney, & L & T Ht
.

8. Th.
Booth calls, fr. Whitaker
: White, Ish
, calls: call on H Robinson
: theatre, E O; Tactics.

9. F.
Museum; Dugdale . Booth calls, fr. Baldwin
: T T calls n .
10. Sa. Languor. Booth dines: Hayward jr calls.

July 11. Su. Settle, Ibrahim, acts 1 & 2. Call on Utterson
na . Hot weather, 4 days.

12. M. Ibrahim, fin. Utterson calls: Kenney, L Ht & T, Bacon, H P, M W S & W sup; adv. Lubé, P P & Burnet
. Macmillan calls.

13. Tu. Call on Wilbraham
: meet Aldis .

14. W. Seek Davison : call on Wilbraham{,} Crown Office
: M W S & W dine; adv. Booth, T Ht & R Manning jr
.

15. Th.
Crown Office; adv. Wilbraham
.

16. F. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Jo G
: theatre, Married & Single.
17. Sa. Commonwealth, çala. Peacock calls twice: Hazlit sups. Booth at tea.

July 18. Su. Commonwealth, Scobel, &c. Seek Davison : call on Booth
: dine at M W S , w. M J & W; adv. Kenney, L & T Ht & H P
.

19. M. Commonwealth, 2d Parlt . Call on Davison
; &
Hayward jr
: Evans of Tavistock
, & White, Isl , call.

20. Tu. Call on Davison twice: Hayward jr calls n . Booth dines; adv. R Manning
.

21. W.
Booth, all day: M W S dines; adv. Kenney
.

22. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Write to Catalani . J A Manning calls: call on
Wallace
: Hudson dines: theatre, Seventh Bullet; adv. Lambs, Hill, Willet, Gent, & J Taylor
.
23. F. Write to Sir Walter Scott & W Curran . Write to Macmillan & H P . Arthur Brooke calls: Peacock & M W S au soir.

24. Sa. Call on Gregory, surveyor
. Seek Manning{:} call on Macmillan
n : Blagden calls.

July 25. Su.
W H Dickson calls: L & T Ht at tea.

26. M.
Booth dines, from Baldwin
. Theatre, Der Freischutz, act 2.

27. Tu.
Booth calls: call on Curtis
.

28. W.
Booth calls twice: call on Jos. Evans
n .

29. Th. Call on Jos. Evans
: Kenney, M W S & W dine; Peacock calls on M W S .

30. F.
Macgowan calls: Booth dines, from Baldwin
.
W Sharp, engraver, dies, or 25th .
31. Sa. Write for W H Dickson . Theatre, Such Things Are.
Aug. 1. Su. Dine at M W S’s , w. M J & W .
2. M. Clarendon, Hobbes, & Sidney, çala.

3. Tu. Call on Manning
,
Bain
, & Faithful
Macgowan
: seek Macmillan & Faithful : meet Agar : sup at Lamb’s , w. Kenney, L & T Ht, F Ht, & M W S . call on Isa. Booth
: Hazlit calls.

4. W. Draft of Agreement from Baldwin . Call on Hill
&
Booth
.

5. Th. Call on Davison
&
Beadnel
: Museum : M W S dines; adv. Kenney, Thrupp, & L Ht ; invité Ed. Landseer
; après Hazlit calls. Peacock calls.

6. F.
White (Isl) & Booth : call on Davison twice, &
Pouncy
.

7. Sa. Call on Davison; again na : Booth & Macgowan call: Booth dines: theatre, Reign of twelve Hours; adv. Beddoes
.
Aug. 8. Su. Commonwealth; Regicides.

9. M. Call on Baldwin
: ride to Kensington.

10. Tu. Call on Davison
: Museum; Vane, &c : Booth dines: theatre, Alcade. Ayrton calls.
11. W. Relapse. Rehearsal, acts 1, 2, 3. Seek Northcote : L Ht dines.

12. Th.
Whitehall . Rehearsal, fin. M W S & W dine; adv. C Landseer, Kenney & T Ht
. Graham, Edin , calls.
13. F. Vane, Healing Question. Write to Macmillan . Museum; Coney . Hazlit calls.
14. Sa. Barebone’s Parliament.

Aug. 15. Su. Whitlocke, Embassy. Call on Booth
.

16. M. Call on Helder (execute) ,
Taylor
n &
Davison
: Booth at tea: theatre; adv. Ayrton
.

17. Tu. Call on Barber
,
Cooper
,
R Taylor
, &
Booth
n : meet Macgowan & Davison . Call on Anderson
.

18. W. Call on Booth
,
Gill & Co
, &
R Taylor
: seek Saunders : M W S & W dine; adv. Kenney
. Write to Miles .

19. Th. Call on Hill
,
R Taylor
, & (w. him) Overend : Miles calls n : W Sups. Meet Constable .

20. F. Whitlocke, çala. Letters to Canning & sir Walter Scot . Call on Davison
, &
Jo G
: Hamilton, P R R, calls: theatre, Pigeons & Crows.

21. Sa. Write to sir Walter Scott . Call on Davison
: seek Greenhill : call on Curtis
&
Jo G
. Diarrhoea.
Aug. 22. Su. Argenis, p. 30. M W S dines.
23. M. Argenis, p. 69. Booth calls: Booth & Rowbotham sup.

24. Tu. Argenis, p. 79. Call on ( Darton &)
Harvey
,
Macirone
&
Saunders
: meet R Taylor : mrs Harwood & E Ht at tea.

25. W. Call on R Taylor
,
Macirone
&
Saunders
: M W S dines; adv. Kenney & C Landseer
.
26. Th. Argenis, p. 94. Anderson calls. Write to Rowbotham , Booth & Davison . meet Black .
27. F. Write to Canning . Museum; Barebone . Mrs White, Kenney, Booth & M W S dine: theatre, Gretna Green: Mrs White sleeps.
28. Sa. Argenis, p. 118. Hazlit calls.
Aug. 29. Su. King’s Langley, çala: Argenis, p. 148.

30. M. Pilot, p. 162. Call on Rowbotham ; adv. Deacon
: Kenney sups.

31. Tu. Pilot, p. 268. Seek Saunders : Macmillan call: call on Jo G
: Rowbotham & W sup.

Sep. 1. W. Gig, w. W : dine at King’s Langley
: sleep at St Alban’s. M W S dines. Macmillan calls n .

2. Th. Write to Macmillan . Pilot, Vol. II, p. 240. Seek Saunders : call on Hume
&
Knowles
: Mathews calls.
3. F. Pilot, p. 342; Vol. III, p. 223. Macmillan calls twice: meet Macgowan .

4. Sa. Pilot, p. 303, fin. Call on Northcote ; adv. Hume
: Kenney dines: sup at
Lamb’s , w. mrs Williams, M W S, Novello, Holmes, Ryal, Kenney & W . Northcote 78.—Oct. 1746.

Sep. 5. Su. Indisposed. Argenis, p. 174: Faustus, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on Booth
.

6. M. De Senectute, çala: Faustus, fin: Edward II, acts 1 & 2. M W S, Kenney & Booth at tea; adv. W
.

7. Tu. Edward II, fin. State-Paper Office . Theatre, Frozen Lake, & Jonathan.
W dines.

8. W. Commonwealth. Museum; Ellis . Kenney & M W S dine; adv. W & T Ht
. House of Fame, B. I, II.

9. Th. Languor. Cellini, p. 126. Betham calls: call on Jo G
: seek Jas White : call on Brown , at Longman’s
.

10. F. Write to P H G . Cellini, p. 312. Call on
T & H Rodd
: A Harwood at tea.

11. Sa. Notes for Commonwealth.
London Institution; Harleian . Cellini, p. 415. Du Crow; The Reaper. H Rodd calls.
Sep. 12. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Cellini, p. 476. M W S & W dine. Call on Booth .

13. M.
Booth calls, fr. Baldwin
. Museum; Harleian . Cellini, p. 512; Vol. II, p. 66.
W Curran calls. Louis XVIII dies.
14. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Write to L C Lamb . Cellini, p. 178. Anderson calls: theatre, Puzzle a Conjuror. Kenney calls.

15. W. Commonwealth, çala. Write to W G, Enfield
. Cellini, p. 320. Call on
Poole
: White, Isleworth , at tea.

16. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Museum; Somers . Cellini, p. 403, fin. Call on Jo G
&
Wegener
: Kenny, W & M W S dine; adv. W Curran & Wallace ; invité Poole
.
Louis XVIII dies .
17. F. Indisposed. Vertot, Revolutions de Suéde, p. 106.

18. Su.
Bien . Commonwealth, revise. Vertot, p. 286. Seek Bolingbroke .
Sep. 19. Su. Dine at White’s, Isleworth , w. Millers & G White : N G calls n .

20. M. Vertot, p. 332. Call on Isa. Booth
: seek Bolingbroke : theatre, Bashful Man.

21. Tu. Vertot, Vol. II, p. 84. Booth n , & Kenney, ppc, call: dine at M W S’s
.

22. W. Tales, Irving, p. 190. Write to Macgowan . Macgowan calls n : seek Davison & R Taylor : M W S dines; & Hudson. adv. Booth
.
23. Th. Irving, p. 364; Vol. II, p. 230. Major Cartwright dies .

24. F. L C L’s, ms: Irving, p. 304. Call on L C Lamb ; adv. Hamilton, mrs Roe & miss Richardson
.

25. Sa. L C L’s MS. Call on Jo G ; adv. Wegener
: theatre, Dog Days in Bond Street. Write to L C L .

Sep. 26. Su. L C L, çala. Irving, p. 394. Call on Booth
: dine at M W S’s , w. M J .

27. M. Call on L C Lamb
. Theatre, 1/2 Romeo; adv. Bartley
.

28. Tu. Glenarvon, Vol. I. Call on Sh. Turner
n ,
Jno Evans
&
Benningfield
: Booth at tea: theatre, Promissory Note.

29. W. Glenarvon, p. Vol. II, p. 116. Call on Sh. Turner
,
Booth
&
Edw. Kean
: M W S dines; adv. Wallace & W Curran
. meet M .

30. Th. Rheum. Glenarvon, p. 275. Anderson ppc calls: Booth dines; adv. Fisher
: call, w. Booth, on Kean
.

Oct. 1. F. Write to Grattan . Glenarvon, p. 390. Call on Lemon, S P O ; adv. Upcot & Temple
.

2. Sa. Glenarvon, Vol. III. Kean calls: call on Sturmy
.

Oct. 3. Su. Commonwealth, 12 lines; revise. Dine at Rowbotham’s , w. Booth & Mudie, De Lyde & Saburra: adv. Cameron & Fraser
.

4. M. Hints for an Essay on Leisure. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Curtis
,
Kean
n &
Booth
,
Jo G
; adv. Wegener : Booth sups. Fisher calls.

5. Tu. Barus. Brydges on Byron, çala.
Theatre, 1/2 John Bull.

6. W. Barus. Hieronymo, acts 1, 2, 3.
M W S dines. Kean calls.

7. Th. Call on Davison
,
R Taylor
,
Booth
& Macgowan : W sups.

8. F.
State Paper Office . Buy Brome’s Travels. Call on Jo G ; adv. Wegener
: Booth sups; adv. W
.

9. Sa. Robertson, Life, çala. Poole & Keane call n : theatre, 1/2 Inconstant; adv. Poole
.
Oct. 10. Su. Life, 1 page. Robertson, Life, passim. Pluie .

11. M. Free Will, p. 3/2. Keane calls: Hudson dines; adv. Booth
. Pluie .

12. Tu. Life, 2 pages. Burke, çala. Swear, w. Lammin & John ; solr Keane : Fisher & Tyge na , & Lubé call: call on
Jo G ; adv. Wegener
.

13. W. Burke, çala. M W G dines; adv. W Curran, Poole, Lubé, Wallace & W
.

14. Th. Life of Burke, çala. Call on Jo G ; adv. Wegener
: theatre, 1/2 Freischutz.

15. F. Life of Burke, çala. Colburn calls n : call on Kean
: dine at M W S
.
16. Sa. Life of Burke, çala. Beddoes calls: Booth at tea.
Oct. 17. Su. Commonwealth, revise. Life of Burke, çala.

18. M. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Keane
: theatre, 1/2 Freischutz. Notes of on Burke.

19. Tu. Notes on H Tooke. Write to T T . Colburn na , Rowbotham , & Lubé call: call on
J Taylor ; adv. Crosdill
: Adelphi, Valmondi, act 1.

20. W. Indisposed. C Williams, Vol. I. Call on Davison
,
Wallace
n , &
J Evans
n : Keane calls. Injunction served.

21. Th. Letter from Davison . C W, çala. Call on Colburn
. Spirits of the Age, & Attic Miscellany.

22. F. Seek R Taylor nit : call on J Evans ; adv. Hone
: meet Whitaker : M W S dines; adv. Beddoes, W Curran, S Hazlit, H P & W
.

23. Sa. Spirit of the Age, çala. Call on
Hume
: Booth sups. call on Keane
.
Oct. 24. Su. Life, 3 pp. N G & Ellen Ht dine.

25. M.
Keane & Blackmore call: call on
Jo G
, &
Bates, surgeon
: theatre, Freischutz, act, 2, 3; adv. Bentham
.

26. Tu. Call on R Taylor
n &
Davison
: M calls: theatre, 1/2 Figaro.

27. W. Write to L C Lamb . Call on R Taylor
: M W S dines; adv. Wake & W
.

28. Th.
State Paper Office . Call on Davison
. Theatre, Simpson & Co, & Enchanted Courser; adv. Barham

29. F. Call on Davison
, &
O Rees
&
Orme
: Poole calls: theatre, 1/2 Sweethearts; adv. J Taylor
.

30. Sa.
State Paper Office . Call on G Pouncy
&
Keane
; adv. Lubé :
Booth at tea: au soir, on L C Lamb
. Maturin dies .
Oct. 31. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Dine at M W S’s , w. M J & W .

Nov. 1. M.
State Paper Office . Call on Pouncy
&
Curtis
: au soir, Rodd’s ; adv. Parkes
.

2. Tu. Write to L C Lamb , & Lemon . Call on H Robinson ; adv. mrs Collier
: theatre, Rivals; adv. Thelwall
.

3. W. Commonwealth, revise. Call on Pouncy
,
Jo G (adv. Wegener ), &
Keane
: Poole & A Harwood & M W S dine; adv. E & C Landseer, H P & W
.

4. Th.
M W S breakfasts: call of on Hume
&
Macgowan
: theatre, 1/3 Love in Village.

5. F.
State Paper Office . Parkes breakfasts: Keane, Lubé, Booth, Rowbotham & Macgowan dine.

6. Sa.
State Paper Office . Call on Heath (Debtors’ Court) ,
Beddoes
, &
Jo G , w. Wegener : theatre, 1/10 Belvidera.
Nov. 7. Su. Commonwealth, çala. Beddoes & N G call.
8. M. Commonwealth, çala. Elkins calls. Write to Stewart .

9. Tu. Commonwealth, çala. Seek R Taylor : call on Learmouth
,
Prince
, &
mrs Hume
: H P & W dine: theatre, Woman never Vext.

10. W. Call on R Taylor
: M W S dines; adv. W & Gamba
. Aldis calls.
11. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Rain.

12. F. Commonwealth, çala. Macbeth. Prince , Mathews , Booth , & mrs Weare call: theatre, 1/2 Woman; adv. Platt
.

13. Sa. Seek Blackmore : call on Elkins
n ,
Hume
,
Davison
,
H Robinson
n , &
Pouncy
: Booth dines, from Baldwin
.

Nov. 14. Su. Business. Inforced Marriage. Call on Booth (adv. R Baxter ), &
Jo G ; adv. Wegener
.

15. M. Call on Rowbotham (adv. Deacon ), &
G Macirone
: theatre, Macbeth, act 1, 2; adv. Wallace
.

16. Tu. Malcontent. Call on Macirone
, & Elkins: seek Harvey: call on Macmillan .

17. W. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Harvey
&
Rowbotham
: M W S & W dine; adv. Booth
.

18. Th. Commonwealth, revise. Write to sir Walter Scott . Call on Whitaker
n : theatre, Winter’s Tale, acts 4, 5; adv. Wallace
. Call on Keane . L Bolingbroke [ ].

19. F. Inheritance, Vol. I. Call on Whitaker
,
Harvey
&
Faithful
: mrs Boinville calls.
Nov. 21. Su. Commonwealth, p. 313, 314. Bandello, p. Tom. III, p. 96 to 121: Anastasius, p. 124.
22. M. Commonwealth, p. 316. Bandello, p. 145: Anastasius, p. 152. M calls.

23. Tu. Wind & smoke. Bandello, p. 177: Anastasius, p. 208. Dine at M W S’s
.

24. W. Anastasius, p. 296. Faithful & Booth call: call on
Curtis
&
Colburn
.
25. Th. Anastasius, p. 328. Robert Taylor & Booth call: M W S & W dine. White (Isleworth) breakfasts.

26. F. Bandello, p. 201: Anastasius, Vol II, p. 97. Call on Macgowan
: Booth calls: call on Robert Taylor
n : W G (Enfield) calls n .

27. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 318/2. Write to Sir Walter Scott . Call on Northcote (en lit; adv. Hume ), &
Poole
n .

Nov. 28. Su. Commonwealth, p. 319. Inheritance, Vol. II, p. 166. Call on
Booth
.

29. M. Commonwealth, p. 321, 322. Write to Mrs Yaniecwicz . Inheritance, p. 297. Call on
Elkins
n , &
Booth
n : theatre, 1/2 Freischutz, & Hafed the Gheber.

30. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 324. Inheritance, p. 415. Call on H Rodd
: Elkins calls.

Dec. 1. W. Commonwealth, 6 lines. Viscera. Inheritance, Vol. III, p. 81. Call on Bryant
,
H Robinson
, &
Keane (adv. Gen. Devereux ): M W S & W dine; adv. T Ht
.

2. Th. Commonwealth, çala. Inheritance, p. 359, fin. Call on Jo G
.

3. F. Commonwealth, p. 326/2. Bandello, p. 214. Call on Bryant ; adv. Latham
: theatre, Ravenna; adv. J Taylor , Barhams & Talfourd
. M calls.

4. Sa. Dark. Write to Stewart . Elkins calls: call on Bain
.
Dec. 5. Su. Commonwealth, p. 328/2. Dine at Hume’s , w. W. Dallas on Byron . Keane calls.
6. M. Commonwealth, 6 lines. Bandello, p. 231. Raffaele Tapistries.

7. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 329/2.
John Evans calls: call on Booth
: M W S & W dine:
theatre, w. M J & M W S, 1/2 Woman never Vext, & Fr. Lake; adv. C Phillips
.

8. W. Commonwealth, 12 lines. Anastasius, p. 204. Poole calls n : call w. M W S, on
Northcote
: meet w. do , Hume :
M W S dines; adv. Booth
.

9. Th. Commonwealth, p. 329. Anastasius, p. 270. D Rogers & Tyson call: call on Bryant
: Hudsons at tea.

10. F. Commonwealth, p. 330: Anastasius, p. 306. Theatre, Uncle Gabriel; adv. Barham
.
11. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 331. Anastasius, p. 344. M & Booth call.
Dec. 12. Su. Commonwealth, p. 332. Anastasius, p. 388.

13. M. Commonwealth, 12 lines. Write to Stewart . Call on Elkins
: Matthews calls: theatre, K John, act 4; adv. Thelwal
.
14. Tu. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Booth calls.

15. W. Commonwealth, 1 1/2 pp. Booth & Macgowan call: call on Bryant
: M W S & Lubé dine; adv. H P, W, & T Ht
. sleeps.

16. Th. Commonwealth, p. 333, & 1 page. Call on Mann, Cornhill
.
17. F. Commonwealth, p. 337. Booth calls: meet, at Keane’s, Fisher, Hughes & Brewis .
18. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 341/2. Meet Edw. Prentis & wife , & Bacon .

Dec. 19. Su. Commonwealth, p. 343. Dine at Bryant’s
.

20. M. Commonwealth, çala. Call on Curtis
: theatre, 3/5 Fair Penitent; adv. Barhams, J Taylor, Este & Gent
. call on Booth
n .

21. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 344. Anastasius, Vol. III, p. 134. Seek H Robinson : // call on Pouncy
, &
Elkins
n : conference, M J & Baldwin .

23. W.
Foot. Call on
Ed. Landseer
: M W S & W dine; adv. H Robinson
.

23. Th. Call on Macgowan
,
Keane
na , &
C Knight, bookseller
: Booth at tea: theatre, 1/3 Native Land.
24. F. Commonwealth, p. 346. Anastasius, p. 217. Museum; Ludlow .

25. Sa. Commonwealth, p. 348. Call on Booth
: dine at M W S’s , w. M J & W : Elkins calls.

Dec. 26. Su. Commonwealth, p. 350. Anastasius, p. 280. Rowbotham & Beaumont, painter, call: call on John Evans
&
Bryant
.

27. M. Commonwealth, 12 lines: notes on Ireton. Anastasius, p. 432, fin. Call on Macgowan
: John Evans calls: Booth at tea.

28. Tu. Commonwealth, p. 353/2. M calls: call on Baldwin
.

29. W. Commonwealth, p. 355/2. M calls: call on Baldwin
. &
Jo G
.
Gresham

30. Th. Call on Rowbotham
,
Harvey
&
Barber
: M W S, W & M dine.

31. F. Commonwealth, p. 356. Call on Barber
,
Cooper
, &
O Rees
; adv. Hurst : seek Miles
